title: Letters of General John Forbes relating to the expedition against Fort Duquesne in 1758 compiled from books in the Carnegie Library of Pittsburgh for the Allegheny County Committee, Pennsylvania Society of the Colonial Dames of America by Irene Stewart ; to which is added a list of references on the expedition.
author: Forbes, John, 1707-1759.
